value.title: Unraveling Parkinson's Diversity Using Machine Learning

value.title: The ‘Godfather of AI’ Has a Hopeful Plan for Keeping Future AI Friendly
value.excerpt: Geoffrey Hinton left Google so he could speak more freely about AI’s dangers. He argues that building analog computers instead of digital ones might keep the technology more loyal.

value.title: Best of artificial intelligence, machine learning will be deployed at Air India: Chandrasekaran
